text:
Yatin B. Shah, partner, Bharathkumar Company, has been elected as Chair of the Young Indians (Yi) Salem chapter for 2016-17.

Vikgnesh Sekar, Executive Director, Thriive Cars India Private Limited, has been elected as the Co Chair, Yi Salem chapter.

While Yatin B. Shah holds a master degree in Management from MATS Institute of Management and Entrepreneurship, Vikgnesh Sekar holds a post-graduate diploma in Marketing from Loyola Institute of Business Administration, Chennai, a press release of Yi issued here on Monday said.
title: New office-bearers
